title: Larry Page, Jeff Bezos, and Sergey Brin are close to joining the $300 billion club as tech fortunes soar
full_text: Larry Page, Jeff Bezos, and Sergey Brin are close to joining the $300 billion club as tech fortunes soar. Amazon's Jeff Bezos and Alphabet's Larry Page and Sergey Brin could soon be worth over $300 billion each thanks to the boom in AI stocks.. Sergey Brin, Larry Page, and Jeff Bezos are all approaching $300 billion net worths.Lionel Hahn/Getty Images/Elijah Nouvelage/Remo Casilli/REUTERS <ul><li>The $200 billion club could soon be old new… [+3331 chars]
